channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Unmasking The Banking Sector’s Vulnerability To Cyber Threats
item.description: No one is immune to the dangers of ransomeware attacks. It's time for banking institutions to start fighting back.

item.title: Empathy at a distance

item.title: Russia, Russia, Russia 2024—DoJ Strikes Down Pro-Trump Election Fake News Ring
item.description: The U.S. Department of Justice has taken action to demolish a ring of Trump-favoring and Russian-operated election fake news sites allegedly controlle...

item.title: Compared to perfect
item.description: Perfect is useful. It’s an absolute measure, a north star, a chance to improve our work. But it’s also a shortcut to persistent dissatisfaction. Compa...

item.title: How AI And RFID Can Impact Retail Inventory
item.description: While still in the early phase of working together, RFID and AI have broad retail applications, especially for inventory management.

item.title: Practical approaches for more effective teamwork

item.title: The conspiracy of mediocrity

item.title: Samsung Premiere 9 (2024) 4K Projector Review: Designed For Life
item.description: The long-awaited second generation of Samsung’s premium ultra short throw projector delivers improvements galore in all the right places.
